Control Name: Assesses Compliance with Privacy Commitments of Vendors and Business Partners— On a periodic and as-needed basis, the entity assesses compliance by vendors and business partners with the entity’s privacy commitments and requirements and takes corrective action as necessary.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Compliance with Privacy Commitments of Vendors and Business Partners— On a periodic and as-needed basis, the entity assesses compliance by vendors and business partners with the entity’s privacy commitments and requirements and takes corrective action as necessary.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
